text: The Centre Cannot Hold is the fifth studio album by Australian musician Ben Frost. It was released on 29 September 2017 through Mute Records. ==Accolades== {|class="sortable wikitable" |- ! Publication ! Accolade ! title: The Centre Cannot Hold (album)
